languages: all languages known to its summoner

abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement.
abilities.description: The avatar can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

abilities.name: Turning Immunity.
abilities.description: The avatar is immune to features that turn undead.

abilities.name: Hit Points.
abilities.description: The Avatar of Death appears with hit points equal to half its summoner's maximum hit points.

name: Avatar of Death
